items.sentence: Tom admitted that he had stolen the Mary\'s necklace.
Tom also asked me to tell you he doesn\'t want to go.
Let\'s just say things didn\'t go exactly as planned.
I just couldn\'t pretend that I liked Tom\'s cooking.
I\'m sure Tom is going to like the cookies you baked.
I\'m sure Tom will appreciate any help you can offer.
I\'m sure Tom will be happy to tell us what happened.
Tom drove all night to get here for today\'s meeting.
You don\'t seem to be aware that Tom didn\'t do that.
Don\'t you want to hear about what I did last summer?
